name: Apple iPhone 14
details: Latest Apple iPhone with A15 Bionic chip, 6.1-inch display, and dual-camera system.

name: Samsung Galaxy S23
details: Flagship Samsung smartphone with Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor and 120Hz AMOLED display.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5
details: Sony's premium noise-canceling wireless headphones with up to 30 hours of battery life.

name: Dell XPS 13
details: Ultra-thin and lightweight laptop with 13.4-inch FHD+ display and Intel Core i7 processor.

name: Apple MacBook Pro 16
details: Powerful Apple laptop with M1 Pro chip, 16-inch Retina display, and 1TB SSD.

name: Bose QuietComfort 45
details: High-quality noise-canceling headphones with 24-hour battery life and Bluetooth connectivity.

name: Nintendo Switch OLED
details: Hybrid gaming console with a 7-inch OLED display and improved audio.

name: GoPro HERO11 Black
details: Rugged action camera with 5.3K video recording, waterproof design, and stabilization.

name: Dyson V15 Detect
details: High-end cordless vacuum with laser dust detection and up to 60 minutes of runtime.

name: Sony PlayStation 5
details: Next-gen gaming console with 825GB SSD, ray tracing, and haptic feedback controllers.
